tool_description: API about Green Pass Live News from main italian newspapers.
name: Green Pass Live Italy
title: Green Pass Live Italy

api_list.name: Get news from individual source
api_list.description: Endpoint getting news about Green Pass from an individual source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://green-pass-live-italy.p.rapidapi.com/news/corsera"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "green-pass-live-italy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://green-pass-live-italy.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "green-pass-live-italy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
